data.sentence: The word وَمَا comes from the root م ا and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: night, evening. layl n.m. (f. laylah, pl. layali)
data.sentence: The word وَاللَّيْلِ comes from the root ل ي ل and is associated with the meanings: night, evening. layl n.m. (f. laylah, pl. layali)
The word وَسَقَ comes from the root و س ق and is associated with the meanings: to gather/collect what is scattered.
